29,Competition,competit aris whenev two parti strive common goal cannot share one gain other loss exampl zerosum game competit includ rivalri entiti organ individu econom social group etc rivalri attain exclus goal includ recognitioneg award good mate statu prestig leadership market share nich scarc resourc territori competit occur natur live organ coexist environ anim compet water suppli food mate biolog resourc human usual compet food mate though need meet deep rivalri often aris pursuit wealth power prestig fame competit major tenet market economi busi often associ busi competit compani competit least one firm group custom competit insid compani usual stimul larger purpos meet reach higher qualiti servic improv product compani may produc develop competit often consid opposit cooper howev real world mixtur cooper competit norm optim strategi achiev goal studi branch mathemat know game theori competit studi sever field includ psycholog sociolog anthropolog social psychologist instanc studi natur competit investig natur urg competit circumst also studi group dynam detect competit emerg effect sociologist meanwhil studi effect competit societi whole addit anthropologist studi histori prehistori competit variou cultur also investig competit manifest variou cultur set past competit develop time competit within among speci one import forc biolog especi field ecologycompetit member speci intraspecif resourc food water territori sunlight may result increas frequenc variant speci best suit surviv reproduct fixat within popul howev competit among resourc also strong tendenc diversif member speci result coexist competit noncompetit strategi cycl low high competit third parti within speci often favour highli competit strategi lead speci extinct environment condit harsh evolutionari suicidecompetit also present speci interspecif resourc limit sever speci may depend resourc thu speci compet other gain access resourc result speci less suit compet resourc 43,Financial economics,financi econom branch econom character concentr monetari activ money one type anoth like appear side trade concern thu interrel financi variabl price interest rate share oppos 86,Profit (economics),econom profit differ revenu busi receiv output opportun cost input econom profit differ account profit consid firm implicit explicit cost account profit consid explicit cost appear firm financi statement due addit implicit cost consid econom profit usual differ account profitfrom econom standpoint often view econom profit conjunct normal profit consid firm implicit cost normal profit profit necessari cover implicit explicit cost firm ownermanag investor fund absenc profit parti would withdraw time fund firm use better advantag elsewher forgo better opportun contrast econom profit sometim call excess profit profit remain implicit explicit cost cover enterpris compon normal profit profit busi owner consid necessari make run busi worth time ie compar nextbest amount entrepreneur could earn anoth job particular enterpris includ factor product also view return capit investor includ entrepreneur equival return capit owner could expect safe invest plu compens risk normal profit vari within across industri commensur riski associ type invest per riskreturn spectrum econom profit aris market noncompetit signific barrier entri monopoli oligopoli ineffici lack 181,Electricity generation,electr gener process gener electr power sourc primari energi util electr power industri stage prior deliveri transmiss distribut etc end user storag use exampl pumpedstorag method electr freeli avail natur must produc transform form energi electr product carri power station also call power plant electr often gener power plant electromechan gener primarili drive heat engin fuel combust nuclear fission also mean kinet energi flow water wind energi sourc includ solar photovolta geotherm power fundament principl electr gener discov earli british scientist michael faraday method still use today electr gener movement loop wire faraday disc pole magnet central power station becam econom practic develop altern current ac power transmiss use power transform transmit power high voltag low loss commerci electr product start coupl dynamo hydraul turbin mechan product electr power begin second industri revolut make possibl sever invent use electr major 211,Tank,tank armour fight vehicl design frontlin combat intend offens weapon tactic strateg level tank compromis heavi firepow strong armour good battlefield manoeuvr provid track usual main armament mount turret mainstay modern th st centuri grind forc key part combin arm combat modern tank versatil mobil land weapon platform largecalib cannon call tank gun mount rotat gun turret supplement machin gun weapon antitank guid missil rocket heavi vehicl armour provid protect crew vehicl weapon propuls system use track rather wheel provid oper mobil allow tank move rug terrain counter advers condit mud posit battlefield advantag locat featur enabl tank perform well varieti intens combat situat simultan offens direct fire power main gun defens due near invulner common infantri firearm good resist heavier weapon maintain mobil need exploit chang tactic situat fulli integr tank modern militari forc spawn new era combat armour warfar arriv main battl tank tank typic categoris either weight class light medium heavi superheavi doctrin purpos breakthrough cavalri infantri reconnaiss tank typic exampl larger heavili armour high calibr gun other smaller lightli armour equip smaller calibr
